name: Yuunagi no Horizon
overview: Full-fledged submarine simulation with sound and video. Destroy the Enemy Fleet!! Ike wins the battle against Nazona Republic. Ike's Evening Car is now on. With the assassination of First Lady Ike, the use of nuclear weapons against Nawana, who holds overwhelming power, has made it a full-fledged battle. What is this sound! FM sound source compatible sonar, engine sound, various noises such as irrigation water, and other realistic effects that are essential to the progress of the game. Plenty of beautiful background music is also played. Destroy the enemy main fleet! Receiving work orders from headquarters. A full-fledged submarine simulation game where you go to the target sea and use the water with operational actions from the sea.
